comment: Good teacher, very helpful, knows his industry.

This was one of the worse professors I've had at this University. The textbook was horrendous and assignments were "fly by the seat of your pants". Too bad he is the only one who teaches this course!!!

He just needs to give it up. He's a good guy and very knowledgeable but he is not a teacher. He basically looks down on you because you aren't on his level. Tests are ridiculous, it was an elective and I did more work for it than any other class.

I thought it was extremely easy to take his online 3190 class.  He doesn't exactly make sense in the "instructional" department however.  Had to email him several times 4 clarifications.  Took part of another class and his PPTS suck!  Run-ons and inocomplete thoughts.  Was never really sure what the heck he was asking of me.

I thought it was extremely easy to take his online 3190 class.  He doesn't exactly make sense in the instructional department however.  Had to email him several times 4 clarifications.  Took patr of another class and his PPTS suck!  Run-ons and inocomplete thoughts.  Was never really sure whatvthe hell he was asking of me.

Finance - hope you remember a lot of Accounting 1101, you're going to need it.  He knows his stuff extremely well, but is terrible at explaining it.  Teach yourself or you will fail.  The book is beyond bad (he wrote it).  There aren't even paragraphs - the whole book is literally one big run on paragraph.
Very inconsistent in grading! He has lots of experience in the industry and will let you know about it. Smart guy but be prepared to get with some friends after class to figure out what to do.
Smart guy with a lot of experience in the industry, but he is not a good teacher. Not helpful, be prepared to teach yourself, and he grades inconsistently. Attendance is mandatory.
